name: AudioBeats
description: Audio beats is a tribute to the classic VR rhythm game，serve the core player for music game types．If you are traditional rhythm game users who seeking for hit experience and difficulty，this game will be perfect for you.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7,8,8.1,10 64bit Processor: Core Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE OR Oculus REQUIRED
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7,8,8.1,10 64bit Processor: Core QUAD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE OR Oculus  REQUIRED
